message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, and this is a very competitive price.

Alice, while I appreciate the offer, $20,000 is significantly above my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $8,000 for it at this time.  Let me know if that's something you're willing to consider.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000? I'm confident this price reflects the value you'll gain from it.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $14,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10,000.  This is my absolute maximum, so let me know if you're willing to consider it.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $10,000 is still less than I'd hoped for, I'm willing to accept that price if you can close the deal today.
